channel.title: regression on mlr3 gallery
channel.description: Recent content in regression on mlr3 gallery

item.title: House prices in King County
item.description: This use case shows how to model housing price data in King County. Following features are illustrated: Summarizing the data set Converting data to treat it as a numeric feature/factor Generating new variables Splitting data into train and test data sets Computing a first model (decision tree) Building many trees (random forest) Visualizing price data across different region Optimizing the baseline by implementing a tuner Engineering features Creating a sparser model House Price Prediction in King County We use the house_sales_prediction dataset contained in the package mlr3book in order to provide a use-case for the application of mlr3 on real-world data.
